2) They're harder to fence for an appropriate price, so they generally can't sell them for more than the price of a normal bike, and what's the point of the greater risk of a felony if there's no greater profit in it.

3) Expensive bikes are also much more conspicuous and easy to identify, and it's easier to locate the owners of the bike and easier for the owners to locate the bike, as it sticks out like a sore thumb.
